name: loomii-chat-service

scripts.test:action-list: node dist/test-client.js --chat-regular "Give me 5 steps to improve our cybersecurity strategy"
scripts.test:quick-wins: node dist/test-client.js --chat-regular "Give me 3 quick wins I can implement today"
scripts.test:competitive-analysis: node dist/test-client.js --chat-regular "How do we compete against Zscaler in the market?"
scripts.test:assistance-suggestions: node dist/test-client.js --chat-regular "What's the weather like today?"
scripts.test:agent-action-list: node dist/test-client.js --chat-agent "Give me 5 strategic recommendations for cybersecurity"
scripts.test:agent-quick-wins: node dist/test-client.js --chat-agent "Give me 3 quick wins I can implement today"
scripts.test:agent-competitive: node dist/test-client.js --chat-agent "How should we compete with Zscaler?"
scripts.test:agent-general: node dist/test-client.js --chat-agent "What are the latest cybersecurity trends?"
scripts.test:all-tools:
npm run test:action-list && echo '
=== QUICK WINS ===' && npm run test:quick-wins && echo '
=== COMPETITIVE ANALYSIS ===' && npm run test:competitive-analysis && echo '
=== ASSISTANCE SUGGESTIONS ===' && npm run test:assistance-suggestions
scripts.test:all-agent-tools:
npm run test:agent-action-list && echo '
=== AGENT QUICK WINS ===' && npm run test:agent-quick-wins && echo '
=== AGENT COMPETITIVE ===' && npm run test:agent-competitive && echo '
=== AGENT GENERAL ===' && npm run test:agent-general
scripts.test:tools-complete: echo '=== TESTING REGULAR CHAT TOOLS ===' && npm run test:all-tools && echo '\n\n=== TESTING AGENT TOOLS ===' && npm run test:all-agent-tools

author: bresinski
description: Chat service with AI streaming using LangGraph
